user_input: Use the Joule Model. Use the split operation to divide Nuclear generators in france into 2 objects one in north one in south

default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Joule Model specifications.

tasks.description: In the Joule Model, split the France Nuclear generator object into exactly two generator objects, ensuring each new object's name matches the original format structure.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Use the Joule Model. Use the split operation to divide Nuclear generators in france into 2 objects one in north one in south keep the object name length to 4 characters', select the Generator object for France with fuel/type Nuclear in the Joule Model and split it into two Generator objects. Create the new objects with names  preserving structure, properties and memberships from the source where applicable.
